metadata.title: CVE-2024-36623 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: moby v25.0.3 has a Race Condition vulnerability in the streamformatterpackage which can be used to trigger multiple concurrent write operationsresulting in data corruption or application crashes.

criterions.comment: docker.io-app package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
